markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="Standard">
[Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 330 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=425), [Groetus](/Deities.aspx?ID=345), [Liisglan](/Deities.aspx?ID=540), [Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=288), [Wards of the Pharaoh](/Deities.aspx?ID=208)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 magic item
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Crackling energy disjoins the target. You attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it. If you succeed, it's deactivated for 1 week. On a critical success, it's destroyed. If it's an [artifact](/Traits.aspx?ID=253) or similar item, you automatically fail.
name: Disjunction
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 330 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=425), [Groetus](/Deities.aspx?ID=345), [Liisglan](/Deities.aspx?ID=540), [Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=288), [Wards of the Pharaoh](/Deities.aspx?ID=208)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

 

**Target** 1 magic item
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Deactivate or destroy a magic item.
</summary>
summary: Deactivate or destroy a magic item.
summary_markdown: Deactivate or destroy a magic item.
text: Disjunction Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 330 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Abraxas, Groetus, Liisglan, Nethys, Wards of the Pharaoh Cast somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Target 1 magic item --- Crackling energy disjoins the target. You attempt to counteract it. If you succeed, it's deactivated for 1 week. On a critical success, it's destroyed. If it's an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.
